spec.description: * Access the the Parallels Remote application by login into the [target](@@{Parallels_RAS.address}@@) machine.
spec.name: Parallels_RAS

action_list.description: This upgrade custom action will upgrade your existing Remote server application to the latest input required version
action_list.name: Upgrade

attrs.script:
Write-output "Downloading the RAS file" 
$source = "@@{UPGRADE_FILE_URL}@@"
$Filename = [System.IO.Path]::GetFileName($source)
$dest = "C:\Users\"+$env:Username+"\Downloads\" + $Filename
$wc = New-Object System.Net.WebClient
$wc.DownloadFile($source, $dest)
Write-output "RAS file got downloaded"
Write-output "Installing the RAS"

Start-Process msiexec.exe -Wait -ArgumentList "/i $dest /qn"

Write-output "RAS installation completed"

Write-output "Installing the RAS"

Start-Process msiexec.exe -Wait -ArgumentList "/i $dest /qn"

Write-output "RAS installation completed"

action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes created VMs as well
action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.name: action_start
